PassiveDesc.Name: Nail and Hammer
PassiveDesc.Desc: For this Scene, successful hit will inflict one of Slash Nail, Pierce Nail and Blunt Nail according to the attack. Perform another succesful hit with different attack in the same Scene will proc Nail's effect and remove it. Otherwise increase the stack by 1. Slash Nail --- when proc, for each stack inflict 3 Bleed 1 Fragile next Scene. Pierce Nail --- when proc, for each stack deal 5 Damage to the character. Hit Nail --- when proc, for each stack deal 5 Stagger Damage to the character.
